column1: #Text=Main Aang Appa Katara Momo Sokka Suki Antagonists Fire Nation soldiers Iroh Zuko says : " Minor Foaming mouth guy Koko Kyoshi Warriors Oyaji Unagi " Toph says : " How could you do this to me ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Good job , Twinkle Toes .
#Text=" Katara says : " Maybe you should take your own advice , Toph !
#Text=Ca n't handle a little dirt , Madame Fussy - Britches ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Are we taking a break ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Sokka , sneak attacks do n't work if you yell it out loud .
#Text=" Toph says : " Hungry for a mud pie ?
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'll give you a mud pie !
#Text=" Aang says : " Uh guys , I thought we were supposed to be training me .
#Text=I believe we 've had enough training for today .
#Text=" Toph says : " While Katara cleans up , let 's go have some fun !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Look at all those messenger hawks !
#Text=You know , I 've been thinking about getting one for myself .
#Text=That way , I would n't have to talk to anyone .
#Text=" Toph says : " I got ta say , I like the idea of not talking to you .
#Text=What are we gon na get with our last silver piece ?
#Text=" Toph says : " We can get more money .
#Text=" Toph says : " This is where you seeing people are at a disadvantage .
#Text=Everyone guesses wrong because the dealer moves the rock at the last minute .
#Text=But I can feel it with my earthbending .
#Text=" Toph says : " How can I possibly play ?
#Text=" Dealer says : " You do n't have to see to be lucky .
#Text=Would you like to make the game a little more interesting ?
#Text=" Dealer says : " Well , let 's say you toss in your friend 's fine sword there , then I 'll put up twenty silver pieces against it , and that 's more interesting .
#Text=" Toph says : " I 'll do it for forty silver pieces .
#Text=" Dealer says : " Forty silver pieces it is .
#Text=" Dealer says : " Sorry , little lady , but - Huh ?
